detectors.description:
Cap.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#33-42) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#35)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#36)

detectors.description:
Cap.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#43-53) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#45)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#46)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#47)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#6)

	- Cap.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#43-53)

	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Cap.sol#8)
